thread.title: Stocks to Watch: Goldman Sachs, Netflix, Amazon, Tesla, Microsoft, Roku, UnitedHealth, J&J, Walmart - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: Goldman Sachs, Netflix, Amazon, Tesla, Microsoft, Roku, UnitedHealth, J&J, Walmart - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text:
Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Tuesday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. Group Inc.—Up 1.3%: Goldman Sachs reported higher profit and revenue from a year ago, catching the wave of lower taxes and newly active markets that boosted other big banks’ quarterly earnings. Netflix Inc.—Up 7.2%: The […]
